Based on your preferences, I would recommend two movies that capture the spirit of adventure and exploration: 
1) Wanderlust (2010)
This movie follows the lives of eight very different couples in dealing with their love lives in various loosely interrelated tales all set during a frantic month before Christmas in London, England. The movie features an ensemble cast consisting of Chris Ellis, Joseph Sikora, Keanu Reeves, and many more talented actors who bring their unique skills and talents to the screen and help create some truly memorable movies.
2) The Watcher (2000)
This movie tells the story of Joel Campbell, a former FBI agent who gets so frustrated by his failure to capture Griffin in Los Angeles, that he quits the FBI, moves to Chicago, and remains in psychiatric therapy, unable to function normally. Then he realizes, when opening his mail very late, that a new murder victim is Griffin' s, and the killer sent him pictures of her. Campbell reports this to the police, but is unwilling to join them in the search, suggesting Griffin is too slick and clever; yet he won' t get out of it that easily.

Based on your preferences for a love story with characters from different backgrounds, here are some recommendations:
- Title: Love Story (1970) ) | Plot: A beautiful young woman named Elizabeth runs away from her wealthy family and takes up residence in a small town where she falls in love with a handsome local builder named Christopher. But their happy relationship is threatened by Elizabeth's family who believe that Christopher is too poor to be worthy of Elizabeth, and they attempt to stop Elizabeth and Christopher from getting married by trying to force Elizabeth to break off her engagement with Christopher, and they even go so far as to try to kidnap Elizabeth and Christopher from each other. But their efforts are ultimately in vain, because despite being threatened with disownment by her family, Elizabeth ultimately manages to remain true to herself and to Christopher, and she ultimately manages to find a way to overcome the obstacles that have been put in their way by Elizabeth's family, so they can ultimately manage to get married to each other.
- Title: Titanic (1997) ) | Plot: In 1912, two passengers from different social classes are traveling on the largest ship ever built at the time, the RMS Titanic. The passengers are all very different people with very different backgrounds and lifestyles. But they have all come together to travel on the Titanic. They are all very excited about this trip, because it is going to be such a special experience for them.
